title: The Great Plains
creator_credit: Roman Kroitor, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A study of the prairie region of Canada, showing the varied occupations of farmers and townsmen throughout the year. Prepared primarily for classroom use, the film employs live photography, animation, and in the historical sequences, painting to tell the story of the plains from early days of settlement to such recent developments as the oil industry.
